cards.name: Cellar
cards.rules: +1 Action, Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.

cards.name: Chapel
cards.rules: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

cards.name: Moat
cards.rules: +2 Cards, When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

cards.name: Chancellor
cards.rules: +2 Coins, You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

cards.name: Village
cards.rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions.

cards.name: Woodcutter
cards.rules: +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

cards.name: Workshop
cards.rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

cards.name: Bureaucrat
cards.rules: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

cards.name: Feast
cards.rules: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

cards.name: Gardens
cards.rules: Variable, Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

cards.name: Militia
cards.rules: +2 Coins, Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

cards.name: Moneylender
cards.rules: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +3 Coins.

cards.name: Remodel
cards.rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

cards.name: Smithy
cards.rules: +3 Cards.

cards.name: Thief
cards.rules: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

cards.name: Throne Room
cards.rules: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.

cards.name: Council Room
cards.rules: +4 Cards, +1 Buy, Each other player draws a card.

cards.name: Festival
cards.rules: +2 Actions, +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

cards.name: Laboratory
cards.rules: +2 Cards, +1 Action.

cards.name: Library
cards.rules: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

cards.name: Market
cards.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin.

cards.name: Mine
cards.rules: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more; put it into your hand.

cards.name: Witch
cards.rules: +2 Cards, Each other player gains a Curse card.

cards.name: Adventurer
cards.rules: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

cards.name: Courtyard
cards.rules: +3 Card, Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

cards.name: Pawn
cards.rules: Choose two: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin. (The choices must be different.).

cards.name: Secret Chamber
cards.rules: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. - When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

cards.name: Great Hall
cards.rules: 1 Victory, +1 Card, +1 Action.

cards.name: Shanty Town
cards.rules: +2 Actions, Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

cards.name: Steward
cards.rules: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2 Coins; or trash 2 cards from your hand.

cards.name: Swindler
cards.rules: +2 Coins, Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.

cards.name: Wishing Well
cards.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it is the named card, put it in your hand.

cards.name: Baron
cards.rules: +1 Buy, You may discard an Estate card. If you do, +4 Coins. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.

cards.name: Bridge
cards.rules: +1 Buy, +1 Coin. All cards (including cards in players' hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but not less than 0 Coins.

cards.name: Conspirator
cards.rules: +2 Coins. If you've played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card, +1 Action.

cards.name: Coppersmith
cards.rules: Copper produces an extra 1 Coin this turn.

cards.name: Ironworks
cards.rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. If it is an... Action card, +1 Action. Treasure card, +1 Coin. Victory card, +1 Card.

cards.name: Mining Village
cards.rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions. You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +2 Coins.

cards.name: Scout
cards.rules: +1 Action. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Duke
cards.rules: Worth 1 Victory per Duchy you have.

cards.name: Minion
cards.rules: +1 Action, Choose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

cards.name: Saboteur
cards.rules: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2 Coins less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

cards.name: Torturer
cards.rules: +3 Card, Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

cards.name: Trading Post
cards.rules: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a silver card; put it into your hand.

cards.name: Tribute
cards.rules: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an... Action Card, +2 Actions; Treasure Card, +2 Coins; Victory Card, +2 Cards.

cards.name: Upgrade
cards.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

cards.name: Harem
cards.rules: 2 Coins, 2 Victory.

cards.name: Nobles
cards.rules: 2 Victory, Choose one: +3 Cards, or +2 Actions.

cards.name: Embargo
cards.rules: +2 Coins, Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile. - When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

cards.name: Haven
cards.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Lighthouse
cards.rules: +1 Action, Now and at the start of your next turn: +1 Coin. - While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.

cards.name: Pearl Diver
cards.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

cards.name: Ambassador
cards.rules: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

cards.name: Fishing Village
cards.rules: +2 Actions, +1 Coin, At the start of your next turn: +1 Action, +1 Coin.

cards.name: Lookout
cards.rules: +1 Action, Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

cards.name: Smugglers
cards.rules: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

cards.name: Warehouse
cards.rules: +3 Card, +1 Action, Discard 3 cards.

cards.name: Cutpurse
cards.rules: +2 Coins, Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

cards.name: Navigator
cards.rules: +2 Coins, Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Pirate Ship
cards.rules: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.

cards.name: Salvager
cards.rules: +1 Buy, Trash a card from your hand. +Coins equal to its cost.

cards.name: Sea Hag
cards.rules: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

cards.name: Treasure Map
cards.rules: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

cards.name: Bazaar
cards.rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions, +1 Coin.

cards.name: Explorer
cards.rules: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

cards.name: Ghost Ship
cards.rules: +2 Card, Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

cards.name: Merchant Ship
cards.rules: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins.

cards.name: Outpost
cards.rules: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn's Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can't cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.

cards.name: Tactician
cards.rules: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Buy, and +1 Action.

cards.name: Treasury
cards.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Coin, When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

cards.name: Wharf
cards.rules: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, +1 Buy.

cards.name: Vineyard
cards.rules: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

cards.name: Potion
cards.rules: Worth 1 Potion.

cards.name: Monument
cards.rules: +2 Coins; +1 <VP>

cards.name: Counting House
cards.rules: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

cards.name: Expand
cards.rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card.

cards.name: Forge
cards.rules: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in Coins of the trashed cards.

cards.name: King's Court
cards.rules: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

cards.name: Platinum
cards.rules: 5 Coins.

cards.name: Remake
cards.rules: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand, then gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than the trashed card.

cards.name: Harvest
cards.rules: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.

cards.name: Fairgrounds
cards.rules: Worth 2 VP for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (rounded down)

cards.name: Develop
cards.rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it and a card costing exactly 1 less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.

cards.name: Silk Road
cards.rules: Worth 1 VP for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).

cards.name: Stables
cards.rules: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 Cards and +1 Action.

cards.name: Abandoned Mine
cards.rules: +1 Coin

cards.name: Ruined Library
cards.rules: +1 Card

cards.name: Ruined Market
cards.rules: +1 Buy

cards.name: Ruined Village
cards.rules: +1 Action

cards.name: Survivors
cards.rules: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.

cards.name: Hovel
cards.rules: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.

cards.name: Necropolis
cards.rules: +2 Actions

cards.name: Armory
cards.rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, putting it on top of your deck.

cards.name: Marauder
cards.rules: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

cards.name: Procession
cards.rules: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

cards.name: Graverobber
cards.rules: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

cards.name: Altar
cards.rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

cards.name: Taxman
cards.rules: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals a hand without it). Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card, putting it on top of your deck.

cards.name: Butcher
cards.rules: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand and then pay any number of Coin tokens. If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

cards.name: Journeyman
cards.rules: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

cards.name: Soothsayer
cards.rules: Gain a gold. Each other player gains a Curse. Each player who did draws a card.

cards.name: Amulet
cards.rules: Now and at the start of your next turn, choose one: +1 Coin; or trash a card from your hand; or gain a Silver.

cards.name: Miser
cards.rules: Choose one: Put a Copper from your hand onto your Tavern mat; or +1 Coin per Copper on your Tavern mat.

cards.name: Giant
cards.rules: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face down, +1 Coin. If it's face up, +5 Coins, and each other player reveals the top card of his deck, trashes it if it costs from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and otherwise discards it and gains a Curse.

cards.name: Alms
cards.rules: Once per turn: If you have no Treasures in play, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

cards.name: Quest
cards.rules: You may discard an Attack, two Curses, or six cards. If you do, gain a Gold.

cards.name: Bonfire
cards.rules: Trash up to 2 cards you have in play.

cards.name: Expedition
cards.rules: Draw 2 extra cards for your next hand.

cards.name: Ferry
cards.rules: Move your -2 Coins cost token to an Action Supply pile (cards from that pile cost 2 Coins less on your turns, but  not less than 0 Coins).

cards.name: Plan
cards.rules: Move your Trashing token to an Action supply pile (when you buy a card from that pile, you may trash a card from your hand.)

cards.name: Mission
cards.rules: Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, take another turn after this one, in which you can't buy cards.

cards.name: Pilgrimage
cards.rules: Once per turn: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up); then if it's face up, choose up to 3 differently named cards you have in play and gain a copy of each.

cards.name: Ball
cards.rules: Take your -1 Coin token. Gain 2 cards each costing up to 4 Coins.

cards.name: Raid
cards.rules: Gain a Silver per Silver you have in play. Each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

cards.name: Seaway
cards.rules: Gain an Action card costing up to 4 Coins. Move your +1 Buy token to its pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Buy).

cards.name: Trade
cards.rules: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. Gain a Silver per card you trashed.

cards.name: Lost Arts
cards.rules: Move your +1 Action token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Action).

cards.name: Training
cards.rules: Move your +1 Coin token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Coin).

cards.name: Inheritance
cards.rules: Once per game: Set aside a non-Victory Action card from the Supply costing up to 4 Coins. Move your Estate token to it (your Estates gain the abilities and types of that card).

cards.name: Pathfinding
cards.rules: Move your +1 Card token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Card).

cards.name: Engineer
cards.rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. You may trash this. If you do, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

cards.name: Overlord
cards.rules: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing up to 5 Coins. This is that card until it leaves play.

cards.name: Encampment/Plunder
cards.rules: This pile starts the game with 5 copies of Encampment on top, then 5 copies of Plunder. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

cards.name: Patrician/Emporium
cards.rules: This pile starts the game with 5 copies of Patrician on top, then 5 copies of Emporium. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

cards.name: Settlers/Bustling Village
cards.rules: This pile starts the game with 5 copies of Settlers on top, then 5 copies of Bustling Village. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

cards.name: Castles
cards.rules: Sort the castle pile by cost, putting the more expensive Castles on the bottom. For a 2-player game, use only one of each Castle. Only the top card of the pile may be gained or bought.

cards.name: Catapult/Rocks
cards.rules: This pile starts the game with 5 copies of Catapult on top, then 5 copies of Rocks. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

cards.name: Gladiator/Fortune
cards.rules: This pile starts the game with 5 copies of Gladiator on top, then 5 copies of Fortune. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

cards.name: Charm
cards.rules: When you play this, choose one: +1 Buy and +2 Coins; or the next time you buy a card this turn, you may also gain a differently named card with the same cost.

cards.name: Crown
cards.rules: If it's your Action phase, you may play an Action from your hand twice. If it's your Buy phase, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice.

cards.name: Wild Hunt
cards.rules: Choose one: +3 Cards and add 1 Victory to the Wild Hunt Supply pile; or gain an Estate, and if you do, take the Victory from the pile.

cards.name: Advance
cards.rules: You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you do, gain an Action card costing up to 6 Coins.

cards.name: Annex
cards.rules: Look through your discard pile. Shuffle all but up to 5 cards from it into your deck. Gain a Duchy.

cards.name: Donate
cards.rules: After this turn, put all cards from your deck and discard pile into your hand, trash any number, shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Triumph
cards.rules: Gain an Estate.BBIf you did, +1 Victory per card you've gained this turn.

cards.name: Delve
cards.rules: +1 BuyBBGain a Silver.

cards.name: Tax
cards.rules: Add 2 Debt to a Supply pile.HHSetup: Add 1 Debt to each Supply pile. When a player buys a card, they take the Debt from its pile.

cards.name: Banquet
cards.rules: Gain 2 Coppers and a non-Victory card costing up to 5 Coins.

cards.name: Ritual
cards.rules: Gain a Curse. If you do, trash a card from your hand. +1 Victory per 1 Coin it cost.

cards.name: Salt the Earth
cards.rules: +1 VictoryBBTrash a Victory card from the Supply.

cards.name: Wedding
cards.rules: +1 VictoryBBGain a Gold.

cards.name: Windfall
cards.rules: If your deck and discard pile are empty, gain 3 Golds.

cards.name: Dominate
cards.rules: Gain a Province. If you do, +9 Victory

cards.name: Aqueduct
cards.rules: When you gain a Treasure, move 1 Victory from its pile to this.BBWhen you gain a Victory card, take the Victory from this.HHSetup: Put 8 Victory on the Silver and Gold piles.

cards.name: Arena
cards.rules: At the start of your Buy phase, you may discard an Action card. If you do, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Put 6 Victory here per player.

cards.name: Bandit Fort
cards.rules: When scoring, -2 Victory for each Silver and each Gold you have.

cards.name: Basilica
cards.rules: When you buy a card, if you have 2 Coins or more left, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Plus 6 Victory here per player.

cards.name: Baths
cards.rules: When you end your turn without having gained a card, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Put 6 Victory here per player.

cards.name: Battlefield
cards.rules: When you gain a Victory card, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Put 6 Victory here per player.

cards.name: Colonnade
cards.rules: When you buy an Action card, if you have a copy of it in play, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Put 6 Victory here per player.

cards.name: Defiled Shrine
cards.rules: When you gain an Action, move 1 Victory from its pile to this. When you buy a Curse, take the Victory from this.HHSetup: Put 2 Victory on each non-Gathering Action Supply pile.

cards.name: Fountain
cards.rules: When scoring, 15 Victory if you have at least 10 Coppers.

cards.name: Keep
cards.rules: When scoring, 5 Victory per differently named Treasure you have, that you have more copies of than each other player, or tied for most.

cards.name: Labyrinth
cards.rules: When you gain a 2nd card in one of your turns, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Put 6 Victory here per player.

cards.name: Mountain Pass
cards.rules: When you are the first player to gain a Province, after that turn, each player bids once, up to 40 Debt, ending with you. High bidder gets +8 Victory and takes the Debt they bid.

cards.name: Museum
cards.rules: When scoring, 2 Victory per differently named card you have.

cards.name: Obelisk
cards.rules: When scoring, 2 Victory per card you have from the chosen pile.HHSetup: Choose a random Action Supply pile.

cards.name: Orchard
cards.rules: When scoring, 4 Victory per differently named Action card you have 3 or more copies of.

cards.name: Palace
cards.rules: When scoring, 3 Victory per set you have of Copper - Silver - Gold.

cards.name: Tomb
cards.rules: When you trash a card, +1 Victory.

cards.name: Tower
cards.rules: When scoring, 1 Victory per non-Victory card you have from an empty Supply pile.

cards.name: Triumphal Arch
cards.rules: When scoring, 3 Victory per copy you have of the 2nd most common Action card among your cards (if it's a tie, count either).

cards.name: Wall
cards.rules: When scoring, -1 Victory per card you have after the first 15.

cards.name: Wolf Den
cards.rules: When scoring, -3 Victory per card you have exactly one copy of.

cards.name: Bandit
cards.rules: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes a revealed Treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.

cards.name: Envoy
cards.rules: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one for you to discard. Draw the rest.

cards.name: Stash
cards.rules: Worth 2 Coins. When you shuffle, you may put this anywhere in your deck.

cards.name: Prince
cards.rules: You may set this aside. If you do, set aside an Action card from your hand costing up to 4 coins. At the start of each of your turns, play that Action, setting it aside again when you discard it from play. (Stop playing it if you fail to set it aside on a turn you play it.)

cards.name: Copper
cards.rules: 1 Coin

cards.name: Curse
cards.rules: -1 Victory

cards.name: Estate
cards.rules: 1 Victory

cards.name: Silver
cards.rules: 2 Coins

cards.name: Potion
cards.rules: 1 Potion

cards.name: Duchy
cards.rules: 3 Victory

cards.name: Gold
cards.rules: 3 Coins

cards.name: Province
cards.rules: 6 Victory

cards.name: Platinum
cards.rules: 5 Coins

cards.name: Colony
cards.rules: 10 Victory

cards.name: Copper
cards.rules: 1 Coin.

cards.name: Curse
cards.rules: -1 Victory.

cards.name: Estate
cards.rules: 1 Victory.

cards.name: Silver
cards.rules: 2 Coins.

cards.name: Duchy
cards.rules: 3 Victory.

cards.name: Gold
cards.rules: 3 Coins.

cards.name: Province
cards.rules: 6 Victory.
